listing.listing_description:
Set within the coveted walls of La Réserve de Paris, this sophisticated three bedroom luxury apartment embodies the romantic spirit of the ultimate Parisian pied-à-terre. Tres Chic Trocadero is at once intimate, while offering the exceptional luxury of ample space when compared to typical Parisian standards. Enjoy that certain je ne sais quoi about returning home each day to this timeless area of the world, Trocadero and the 16e Arrondissement!

This chic vacation rental is located in a splendid Haussmann-style, cut-stone building. In the ideal setting for a discreet, private getaway to stylish Trocadero, even the housekeeper will be virtually invisible while serving each morning’s personalized breakfast. Guests will receive complimentary access to all the hotel services of La Réserve de Paris, a five-star hotel and spa, located 3 minutes from the apartment (transfer included), that will make daily life even more magical. Facilities include a swimming pool, fitness center, steam room and library.

The multi-level layout enables an ideal separation between bedrooms and living areas to ensure that all family members can enjoy both private and communal time. The interior design features a magnificently restrained contemporary style in which the pure lines of the furniture and the elegant neutral colors magnificently highlight the architectural beauty of this stunning residence.

The three exquisite bedrooms at this non-smoking apartment accommodate up to six guests. All of the bedrooms feature queen sized beds, en-suite bathrooms and televisions. One of the suites also has a rain shower and a balneotherapy tub. Fine linens and accoutrements provide splendid nights of rest amid the hushed frequencies of the city. Ideal for extended business and leisure stays in Paris, the location in the 16e Arrondissement is close to activities for both parents and children.

Guests of Tres Chic Trodacero will enjoy the services of a full, professional staff. Daily housekeeping, butler service, daily breakfasts, a welcome package, daily afternoon tea times, laundry service and valet service are all included with your holiday reservation. Sportive guests will also love use of the bicycles and complimentary access to the Roland Garros Tennis Courts, home of the French Open. Paris never looked so good!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Retreat to your slice of paradise at this exclusive modern estate in Athens. Large outdoor areas, such as this, are rare in the city, so take advantage and work on your tan, go for a swim, and dine alfresco. When you’re ready to explore, the city centre is just 4 km from home. Or head uphill to the Acropolis of Athens, the city’s 5th-century B.C. temple and museum. 

Partially divided by a double-sided fireplace, the open concept living area is the perfect setting for a dinner party. Atop earthy hardwood floors, contemporary furniture and high-end electronics add a stylish touch to the decor. Get inspired and make an attempt at traditional Greek cuisine in the state of the art kitchen or grill up some goat on the barbecue outback. After dinner, move the party to the outdoor lounge for cocktails. 

On quieter nights, stretch out by the fireplace, stream a movie, or catch up on some reading outside by the pool. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the gym on the lower level has free weights, machines, and aerobic equipment. And, despite its downtown location, Urban Villa has garage parking for 6 and an elevator to help with any accessibility issues.

Athens is home to Greece’s National Archaeological Museum, which happens to be one of the world’s largest, and richest, collections of exhibits and artifacts. After a morning of discovery, head to the winding 19th-century streets of Plaka for a gyro. This bustling area is packed with family-run shops and incredible Greek food stands. At night, do some bar hopping in the Exarchia neighborhood. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Surround yourself with inspiring views of the Amalfi Coast and World-famous beaches at this clifftop home in Capri. Sip Italian wine at the alfresco dining set as the sun sets over the bay below. For dinner, craft the perfect pie in the pizza oven on the terrace or grill up something fresh from a local market on the barbecue. After, walk 10 minutes down to the village of Capri for lively nightlife.

Combining a few simple, high-quality ingredients is often the best way to create a delicious meal, and the same rings true with Hibiscus Capri’s decor. Elegant white meets warm wood tones, all atop intricate marble floors. With fragrant gardens, a wood-burning fireplace, and moonlit ocean-views, romance is always in the air. After making dinner together in the cozy kitchen, dine outside next to the Tyrrhenian Sea.

Like most homes on the Capri coast, Hibiscus is only accessible by foot, so privacy is not an issue at this gated property. Stretch out in a sun lounger on the terrace and work on that vacation tan. Enjoy your morning Nespresso in the shade while you catch up on some reading, glancing away now and then to check out the sailboats in the bay below.

Start your day with a stroll along the shore of Spiaggia di Marina Piccola, 8 minutes away. After, visit the cafes and bakeries of Capri for a late breakfast. Then, walk across Via Camerelle for high-end shopping in some of the World’s most prestigious fashion houses. At dinner, you’ll find an abundance of fresh seafood and traditional Italian cuisine in town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set in the clouds at Chamonix Mont-Blanc, this lofty chalet is within walking distance to the famous Les Grand-Montets ski lift. Soaring ceilings open up the interior alongside towering windows that look out onto a snow-capped mountain vista and dense forest. Hit the slopes for a day of flurried fun before warming up with a piping hot cup of cocoa in front of the roaring living room fire.

Soft lighting and a glacial colour scheme ensure a cozy, welcoming atmosphere. Alpine architecture, nature-inspired décor, and unpolished stone features add rustic charm. The natural framework of the chalet is complemented by tree trunk foot rests and artful timber accents. A royal blue painted lounging area offers an après-ski chill out zone. Why not select a bottle of vino from the in-house wine cellar before picking a seat in the theatre and kicking back with a favourite film? A dedicated ski room features heated boot warmers and plenty of space to stow your equipment.

Decompress with a full body wrap or steam in the massage suite—which doubles as a children’s play place with games and a television. You’ll love choosing a binge-worthy book and spending hours reading on exhausted evenings in the library. In the summertime, a terrace pool provides relief from the scorching sun, while in the winter your private sunken hot tub is the perfect way to relax sore muscles. Panoramic views from the wrap-around deck create a sense of harmony with the landscape.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in the dawn light from the rooftop terrace of this hidden and highly sought-after Venetian apartment. Tucked away near the beating heart the city, St Mark’s Square, this comfortable yet compact home includes a lushly-outfitted living room and rich bedrooms complete with birds-eye street views. Guests are just moments from the ornate bridges, gondolas and stunning sights of ancient Venice. 

Stepping in from the bright sunlight of the street, this apartment provides a shaded, cool and impressively furnished launch-pad for your stay in this storied metropolis. The main living room is a subtle combination of rustic stone and wood featuring, with hand-crafted furniture and rich, soft sofas that are ideal for relaxing after a day walking the historic squares and winding streets of the city below. Take in the morning light with a coffee from the balconies, or kick the day off with breakfast from a local bakery on the converted rooftop terrace, which allows guests to sample the ambience of the day before setting off. After an active afternoon, the refurbished bathroom ensures guests can freshen up in delightful comfort.

The star feature of this apartment is the range of options it opens up for guests. Forget Venice’s famously bad traffic, and take a peaceful stroll to local jewels, such as the leafy Royal Gardens, the centuries-old grandeur of St Marco’s Piazza, or the stunning spires and cosmic frescos of the adjacent basilica. With a water taxi hub very close by, guests can quickly sweep out to the stunning scene that is the Grand Canal, taking in a vast number of cathedrals, stately homes and impressive bridges. After an evening dining at one of the fashionable restaurants and Italian restaurants that pepper your home district, a glass of wine on the rooftop terrace serves as a fine way to end a day in one of Europe’s most legendary cities.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking Rio di San Polo from the piano nobile of Palazzo Morosini, this modern Venetian apartment is right in the heart of Venice. Gaze out the living room windows to watch people on the streets below and gondolas floating by in the canal. When you’re ready to join the action, start with a walk to St. Mark’s Basilica, you’ll pass a few other notable sites along the way.

 

Venice is a city known for its lack of space; this is not the case in Coriandolo. A minimalistic great room, containing an eat-in kitchen flows over to the Smart TV lounge, with scenic windows along the riverside wall. Thoughtful placement of the bedrooms on either side of the living room creates a little extra-privacy. And, each ensuite is finished with high-end fixtures and Venetian marble.

 

It may not look it from the outside, delightfully so, but Coriandolo has some great tech-features, like heated floors, an integrated sound system, and Wi-Fi. During your stay, you’ll have access to the communal gardens and outdoor kitchen, as well as a helpful list of add-ons. The kitchen may be small, but it comes with everything you’ll need, including a dishwasher and Nespresso machine.

 

Rialto Market is a great place to stock your pantry. If you’d like to taste the freshest local produce without doing any of the leg work, stop in at Osteria All’ Arco. It’s just down the street from the market, where nearly all of the restaurant’s ingredients are purchased daily. Feel like a drink, check out one of Hemingway’s favorites, Harry’s Bar, it’s also the birthplace of the Bellini.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Can Savi is an extraordinary country villa in Ibiza, situated on a 15,000-square-meter, gated estate about ten kilometers from Ibiza Town. The villa enjoys exquisite privacy and serenity within easy reach of the island's famous nightlife and beaches. Along with gorgeous gardens and alfresco living and dining areas, the villa features exquisite interiors, outstanding entertainment amenities, and six deluxe king bedroom suites.

Enjoy enchanting days and nights in the Mediterranean light and breeze, surrounded by gorgeous native gardens and trees. Luxuriate on elegant loungers in the noonday, and plunge into your sparkling private swimming pool. Sip cool refreshments on stylish sunbeds, or gather in the sumptuous, canopied lounge. 

The villa's luminous and spacious interiors provide an exquisite contemporary counterpoint to the estate's rustic charm. Sip a fine Spanish wine in the sumptuous living room, which includes two desks and a library. Kindle a fire in the adjoining lounge, and relax on the crescent sofa while watching a favorite film. Cook a delectable meal in the fully equipped kitchen with charming exposed wood beams and stone range cover, and enjoy dinner in the gorgeous formal dining room. The villa also features an ample balcony with an additional alfresco dining table, seating area, and hammock.

The bedroom suites are spacious, elegant, and cozy—perfect for afternoon siestas and relaxing nights. Each of the six suites has a king bed (in some, the king can be converted into two twins), and all have ensuite bathrooms. The spectacular master suite enjoys a private terrace, walk-in closet, and jetted tub in its bathroom.

Can Savi provides an extraordinary degree of privacy and serenity on the isle of Ibiza, while also placing you within a short drive of Ibiza Town and the fabulous beaches at Talamanca and Cala Llonga. The airport is only fourteen kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’ve been dreaming of Tuscany, make your fantasies reality at Il Prato di Vignamaggio. Quaint and charming, this vacation rental in the Chianti countryside has it all: views of rolling hills, vineyards in operation for more than 600 years, and the sort of stone buildings that have dotted the area since the Renaissance. Step into the tradition and make the estate’s history part of your own memories.

Il Prato, which translates roughly to “meadow,” is an oasis within the Vignamaggio estate, set amid lush lawns and private grounds where you’ll find a pool, plenty of loungers in the sun, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining area. The property may have a long and distinguished heritage, but it also has modern amenities from an exercise room and hammam to a TV and Wi-Fi.

There are two buildings at Il Prato: the main farmhouse, La Colonica; Il Cottage, framed by cherry and fig trees. Though many traditional features remain, such as the stone exterior walls, beamed ceilings and cotto floors, the houses’ living spaces feel fresh and bright thanks to pieces like slipcovered sofas and ladder-back dining chairs. Gather around the fireplaces in the living rooms for a chat, or at the tables in one of the two fully equipped kitchens for a snack and a glass of wine.

There are six bedrooms in La Colonica and two in Il Cottage, all eight with en-suite bathrooms. La Colonica has two king bedrooms, two with double beds and two with two twin beds each. In Il Cottage, you’ll find one bedroom with a king bed and one with two twin beds. The eight bedrooms at Il Prato can accommodate up to sixteen friends and family members on holiday together.

Guests of Il Prato are welcome to book a wellness treatment, cooking course or private dinner with the chef at Vignamaggio. Explore the estate on foot or by bike, winding through forests, olive groves and vineyards, or take a drive to Florence or Siena for a day trip. Having featured in the 1993 film Much Ado About Nothing, Vignamaggio makes an idyllic setting for an Italian country wedding—or a romantic honeymoon.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience both the tranquil and lively sides of Ibiza at Villa Idurre. This brand-new vacation rental is located in a quiet residential neighborhood just outside the village of San Lorenzo, and feels like a private retreat in the countryside. But with Ibiza town, shopping and dining, and an array of beaches only a short drive away, it’s easy to take advantage of all the island has to offer.

This gated property has a lovely garden with panoramic views and an expansive pool and terrace. Stretch out in the sun on one of the loungers placed along the length of the pool, or enjoy the shade of the Balinese-style daybed or covered sitting area. Heat up the barbecue and linger around the al-fresco dining area, or step inside and serve refreshments to family and friends from the wine fridge around the cozy wood-burning fireplace.

Though this luxury villa is newly built, it has the architectural charm of a traditional estate. Massive wooden entry doors give way to interiors with thick stucco walls and wood-beamed ceilings, and the ladder-back chairs in the dining area could have come from a local farm. But the villa also has a modern side, from the sleek sofas in the entry and TV lounge to the fabulous stone countertops in the fully equipped kitchen.

There are four bedrooms in the main house at Villa Idurre and one in a separate guest house. The main house has a master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, one bedroom with a double bed and en-suite, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each, one of which has an en-suite. The guest house, which could be used as a honeymoon suite or a tucked-away escape for in-laws, has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and its own kitchenette and living area.

Ibiza may be known for its nightlife, but a holiday on the island can be relaxing as well. Take time to explore the oceanfront towns of Portinatx or Santa Eularia des Riu, or spend a day soaking in the sun and scenery on the nearby beaches of Cala Benirras, Puerto San Miguel, Cala San Vicente and Cala Xarraca. Of course, it’s easy to spend an unforgettable night out in Ibiza town, only a 15-minute drive from Villa Idurre.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set into a lush hillside, this architecturally masterful villa stands out against its natural backdrop. Dense flora ecompasses the backyard for maximum privacy. Enter through a private gate and stroll up a sun-bleached stone staircase to reach your front door. Modern touches blend with rustic charm to create a ruggedly handsome aesthetic. A 6-minute drive lands you in the coveted Es Cubells area.

Expansive glass doors ensure the interior glows with golden daylight. Typical Ibizan archways lead to the vast terrace. In the fully-equipped kitchen, a large island makes culinary prep effortless, while cabinets made from 200-year old Canadian Barnwood are visually intriguing. Savour an unforgettable alfresco meal under dripping trees and hanging thatch lanterns on the back porch with the Mediterranean sunset as your backdrop. Up on the 4th level, you’ll encounter a Chiringuito-style rooftop bar with plenty of seating; think of it like your own private beach club. 

Along the property you’ll find a variety of entertainment, sports, and yoga platforms. Catch a glimpse of the island of Formentera as you meditate in tree pose or deadlift a kettlebell. The turquoise-tiled swimming pool entices you to work harder, serving as a refreshing way to cool down. Venture into Sant Josep de sa Talaia to savour a taste of authentically prepared paella, mouth-watering tapas, and fruity sangria. Ibiza’s town centre is a short drive away where a vibrant nightlife awaits. Explore the protected cove at Cala Vadella or trek through the surrounding pine-clad hills.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Jade is a gorgeous luxury home on the northeast coast of Mallorca. Situated within Cap Vermell Estate, an exclusive community of twelve villas with a private country club, the home is nestled on 1,700 square meters of private grounds with sweeping views of Canyamel Valley. The beautifully constructed villa blends the rustic elegance of the Balearic Islands with superb modern comforts, including a voluminous saltwater swimming pool with retractable cover. Three lovely bedroom suites accommodate six travelers, making it an ideal choice for families and destination wedding guests. The vacation rental includes discounted access to Cap Vermell Country Club and other communal amenities, and Camanyel Beach is just a few minutes away.

Cloistered amid high hedges, the villa's ample estate inspires long days and evenings under the Mediterranean sky. The pool is perched along the side of the house, accompanied by lounge chairs, a lush lawn, and a cool veranda. An exterior staircase leads to the upper balcony, featuring an alfresco dining table and open-air lounge with breathtaking views.

The main interior living area is on the upper level, with lovely French doors opening to the balcony. This open-concept space includes a lounge area and dining table four six beneath peaked, exposed-wood ceilings. Just off the dining area, the gourmet kitchen features high-end appliances and walnut cabinets. The home's gorgeous décor includes museum-worthy artwork and design pieces set against luminous white surfaces that glow with abundant daylight and sunset tones. The villa also includes an office for your convenience, as well as air conditioning and underfloor heating.

The bedrooms are on the ground level, opening to the pool terrace. Each features a double bed and ensuite bathroom, providing comfortable havens for afternoon siestas and peaceful nights. Two of these ensuite bathrooms have tubs, one with spa-style jets. Additional bedding is available upon request.

Villa Jade balances serene privacy with resort-style convenience, just minutes from the renowned Canyamel Golf Course and Canyamel Beach. Cap Vermell Country Club offers guests a wide array of sport and wellness amenities, as well as delicious, health-conscious cuisine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A holiday in the French Riviera never smelled sweeter than at Mas Peyloubet. Not only is this luxury vacation rental nestled amid lavender, rose bushes, and olive and fruit trees, it’s just outside the town of Grasse, known as the perfume capital of the world. Lush grounds with views over the countryside to the Cote d’Azur and seven suite-style bedrooms are the perfect setting for a quiet family reunion or a private and romantic destination wedding.

Approached by a long driveway that winds up the hill, the villa feels like its own little world. Stone walls and hedges open to reveal lush lawns, terraces with inviting sitting areas and pergola-covered rows of lounge chairs. Spend the day taking in the views of the valley from a spot by the saltwater swimming pool, then, as the sun sets, open a bottle of rosé from the outdoor bar and heat up the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen before sitting down to the al-fresco dining area. Serve up friendly competition on the ping-pong table for a lively evening, or flip on the sound system and settle in front of the fireplace for a quieter night in.

The main house at Mas Peyloubet dates to the 18th century, and its traditional architecture has real charm and presence. Cheerful coral walls are covered in flowering vines and complementary blue shutters, and the open-air living spaces are defined by stately columns and exposed wooden beams. The interiors are eclectic and comfortable, pairing floral-print sofas with cognac-hued leather chairs. But they’re also practical, featuring a dining area that can seat fourteen and a fully equipped modern kitchen.

There are five bedrooms. All but one of houses bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom. Large windows edged by wrought-iron railings flood the bedrooms with light, while soft, neutral bedding and furniture in traditional silhouettes give a country-chic vibe.

During your stay, be sure to taste the olive oil pressed from trees on the property, and jams and marmalades made from the figs and oranges grown by the villa. If you’re visiting in the spring or summer, keep an eye out for the sweet-scented jasmine and rose festivals in nearby Grasse, and book some playing time at the golf and tennis clubs a 5-minute drive away. It’s a short drive from the villa to Cannes, where you can watch the city from an oceanfront café or take a honeymoon-style stroll along the Croisette and beaches, and both Antibes and Nice are close enough for a day trip.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular villa on the Amalfi Coast is a short walk from the beach at Marina di Praia, and about nine kilometers from Positano. The multi-story home was built gracefully into the cliffs above the sea, with multiple balconies and terraces in the sun and shade, a lovely alfresco dining area, and an open-air plunge pool gazing out at the vast horizon. The interiors are comfortable and elegant, with stylish furnishings, high-end media features, and a gourmet kitchen. All five bedroom suites enjoy breathtaking sea views, ensuite bathrooms, and balcony access, offering ideal accommodations for families and groups of friends up to ten in size.

Nestled amid lush gardens and trees, the villa’s ample terraces inspire long days and evenings in the Mediterranean breeze. Soothe your body in the plunge pool and bask in the sunlight on lovely lounge chairs. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, rinse in the alfresco shower and savor a siesta in the dappled shade of citrus trees. Relish home-cooked meals at the table for ten, and sip delicious wine in the outdoor lounge as the sunset transforms the sea and sky.

Inside, the beautiful symphony of tones includes black-and-white floor tile, rich wood cabinetry, and a superb timber dining table extending from the kitchen island. The TV den offers a cozy retreat for afternoon downtime or late-night movies. Heating and air conditioning ensure comfort in all seasons.

The bedrooms are located on the lower floor, each with a double bed, ensuite bathroom, deluxe linens, and access to the expansive balcony—a lovely spot for morning coffee or quiet relaxation. The rooms' luminous white surfaces, touches of sea-inspired color, and gorgeous stone thresholds harmonize with the sublime surroundings.

Villa Don Pietro is ideally positioned for exploring the splendors of the Amalfi Coast, within easy reach of Positano, Amalfi town, and the breathtaking fjord at Furore. Drive about seventeen kilometers to the extraordinary town of Ravello, a UNESCO World Heritage Site that has attracted famous travelers for centuries. Boat trips to the islands of Capri, Ischia, and Procida embark from Positano, Amalfi, and Sorrento. You're an easy car trip from the treasures of Pompeii.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The famously luminous sunlight of Venice bounces off the water and into this restored apartment near the Canale Grande. Beamed ceilings and plaster walls speak to the city’s architectural history, but Lucite pieces place it in the now. It’s less than a 10-minute walk to both the Italo-Byzantine splendor of St. Mark’s Basilica and the medical museum at the imposing Scuola Grande di San Marco. 

This luxury property may feel like a centuries-old palazzo, but it boasts all the amenities of a modern home, from cable TV and Wi-Fi to air conditioning. A dishwasher makes light work of cleaning up after homemade feasts, and laundry facilities make it easy to start fresh on each day of your holiday. 

Murano chandeliers hanging from wood-beamed ceilings and richly patterned area rugs on the floors give this vacation rental a sense of traditional grandeur. But there’s modern flair in the living and dining rooms, too, thanks to Lucite accent tables and dining chairs around a table for 6. And the fully equipped kitchen is all contemporary, with a galley layout and sleek, high-gloss cabinets. 

Each of the apartment’s 3 bedrooms has a king bed and air conditioning; 1 has a private ensuite bathroom and the other 2 have shared access to a hall bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms pair the traditional with the modern with ease, putting streamlined shelves against ornate ceiling moldings and wrought-iron bed frames. 

A stay at this villa makes it easy to explore the city. Walk 8 minutes to St. Mark’s Basilica, one of the most iconic sights in Venice—if not in Italy—and admire both the swirling ornamentation and the crowds on the piazza outside. The marble-faced Scuola Grande di San Marco, also 8 minutes away, is primarily a hospital but also houses a small medical museum. Bring the family out for cicheti, or little bar bites, or relive your honeymoon over a lengthier dinner at a canal-side restaurant. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
It’s all in the name of Chalet Dolce Vita. The private spa, attentive staff and custom finishes at this luxury Veneto vacation rental give up to eight guests a taste of the good life. Visit during the winter to experience the ski slopes that once hosted the Winter Olympics, or during the summer to explore the museums, churches and more in the historic Cortina region.

Your holiday at the chalet includes the services of a butler, driver and housekeeper. The property is designed to be both practical and pampering, with amenities like heated ski storage and an elevator along with a spa area that features a hot tub, sauna, gym, indoor pool and more. Whether you’ve spent the day skiing or sightseeing, a wood fireplace, games room and home theater make it easy to spend the evening relaxing or entertaining.

The villa’s four levels offer more than 8,000 square feet of living space and are connected by an elevator. Though traditional on the outside, with a peaked roof and overhanging eaves, Chalet Dolce Vita is cozy and modern on the inside. Warm wood floors form the backdrop for contemporary pieces like tuxedo-style sectionals, Lucite accent tables and sleek fireplace surrounds. An open-plan living room with a wet bar, formal dining area and fully equipped kitchen let you host a casual soiree or elegant dinner.

All four of the chalet’s bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms with jetted tubs and their own lounge areas, and most of them open to balconies. The honeymoon-worthy master suite has a king bed and two en-suites, as well as a fireplace that invites snuggling up. There are two bedrooms with queen beds, and one bedroom with bunk beds that gives kids a space all their own and makes this villa perfect for a family trip.

Chalet Dolce Vita is no more than a 10-minute walk from two different ski lifts, and no more than a 10-minute drive from three other lifts. It’s also a short walk from central Cortina, which has shopping, dining, traditional churches and even a modern art museum. Other must-sees in the area are a paleontology museum with fascinating exhibits on Dolomite fossils, and the Forte Tre Sassi, an imposing Alpine fortress.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy both views over the quiet countryside and a location close to the hottest spots on Ibiza at Can Vista Belle. As its name suggests, the panoramas from the multiple terraces at this contemporary vacation rental stretch all the way to the sea. Stay at the villa for a quiet getaway with family, or, if you’re on holiday with friends, make the short drive to the oceanfront clubs and bars at the ever-popular Platja d’en Bossa.

Set just off the San Jose road, this luxury villa is tucked away amid private gardens and manicured lawns. Revel in the Mediterranean sunshine from a pool area with plenty of loungers lined up or one of the upper-level terraces, which have sitting and dining areas and a barbecue. If you choose to stay in instead of going out in the evenings, there’s plenty to entertain, from an Apple TV and Wi-Fi to a sound system and a piano.

Nearly wall-to-wall glass sliding doors link the terrace to the open-plan great room, which stretches the width of the house and offers equally stunning views. Pared-down furnishings such as a built-in sectional and farmhouse-style table in the sitting and dining areas are contrasted by whimsical oversized artwork. The sleek kitchen is set against one wall and is fully equipped.

Each of the four bedrooms at Can Vista Belle has a king bed and a private en-suite bathroom; two of the four also have sea views and terrace access. The suites have the same minimalist modernism as the common living spaces, as well as their own vibrant artwork.

While it’s possible to spend your stay savoring the quiet of the villa, it’s also easy to drive to some of Ibiza’s trendiest spots. Take an afternoon or evening to wander the streets of the historic section of Ibiza Town or have a honeymoon-worthy dinner at an up-and-coming restaurant. Or take a day of sand and sea on the popular stretch of Platja de ses Figueretes, followed by an unforgettable night at the beachfront clubs and bars of Platja d’en Bossa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With a sun-soaked terrace, private pool and location close to the beach, Alegre Belle offers the best of a warm-weather getaway in Ibiza in a thoughtful mid-century-inspired setting. The exterior is classic Ibiza, with sleek white walls and plenty of windows with views of the sea, but the cool, sophisticated interiors are filled with iconic pieces. Four bedrooms and spacious living areas provide enough room for families or groups of friends, but there’s a separate apartment, too, if you need it.

A winding road leads you through a residential neighborhood to the gates of Alegre Belle. Spread out in front of the house are a deck with glass railings to preserve the views, an infinity pool, rows of lounge chairs and a barbecue. If the Mediterranean sun proves too much, seek shade under one of the sun umbrellas or in the covered outdoor sitting and dining areas. Entertain guests in the evening with the smart TV and Wi-Fi, and refresh towels and swimsuits in the laundry facilities.

The villa’s stately wooden front door swings open to a great room with a bar corner, two sitting areas and views out to the hills and water. Gather to read or chat on the grouping of tan sofas around a natural wood coffee table, or sit in the Egg chairs around the limestone and granite fireplace to watch the television mounted on the surround. Windows on two sides of the dining room create a light, airy feel, and Louis Ghost chairs only enhance the sense of spaciousness. The bright, minimalist kitchen is fully equipped and has ultra-sleek white Boffi cabinets.

Each of the four bedrooms at Alegre Belle has a king bed and en-suite bathroom with stand-alone shower. The master suite, which spreads out across the entire top floor, opens to its own terrace with a private al-fresco sitting area. The other three bedrooms are in a separate wing and offer ample space and privacy. On the lower level, you’ll find an additional bedroom with its own entrance, a king bed, en-suite bathroom and a kitchenette.

Everything you need is within a short drive of Alegre Belle. It’s just 6 km to the Tropicana Beach Club, located on one of the island’s best beaches, and 16 km to the famed restaurants, nightlife and shopping in Ibiza Town. When it’s time to leave, plan on an 13 km drive to Ibiza Airport.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With Florence and Brunelleschi’s Dome in the distance, Limonaia La Gressa boasts one of the best views in all of Tuscany. Only seven kilometers from the city, this vacation rental is close enough to enjoy all of Florence’s major attractions, but far enough to peacefully luxuriate in the home’s lush garden and open-air terrace.

Recently renovated, Limonaia La Gressa meets the highest standards of luxury vacation rentals without disturbing any of its original elements, like terracotta flooring, rugged exposed-beam ceilings, and stone terrace. Inside, the villa’s rooms are linked with beautiful arched doorways and decorated with stately designer furnishings. The fully equipped kitchen features stainless steel appliances, thick-cut granite countertops, and a brilliant backsplash. Underneath chandelier lighting, your group will love enjoying meals and celebrating special occasions in the elegant formal dining room. And, with several lounge spaces and smaller sitting areas, both inside and out, you’ll have no trouble orchestrating group gatherings or sneaking away for more intimate moments.

Outside, you’ll love the view from the heated swimming pool and surrounding sun lounger chairs. For a casual lunch, fire up the pizza oven or barbeque and dine alfresco under the covered portion of the terrace. Back inside, you’ll appreciate Wi-Fi, a sound system, cable television, and air conditioning. And, when it’s time to retire for the evening, all five of Limonaia La Gressa’s beautiful bedrooms come with lavish en-suite bathrooms, and either a king or a pair of twin sized beds.

Ten minutes from the villa, you’ll find the Stibbert Museum, containing thousands of artifacts from Eastern and Western civilizations. Travel just a little bit further and you’ll hit Fiesole’s Roman Theatre and Piazza Della Liberta, both about seven-kilometers from home. And, just eleven-kilometers from home, the seemingly endless supply of museums, art galleries, historic sites, monuments, and nightlife of Florence, Italy await you on your next Luxury Retreats vacation.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A decidedly bold and stylish residence, this roomy apartment in centrally-located Marylebone delivers with both flair and convenience. An impressive color scheme of black and white gives the home character and a modern feel. Use of mirrored walls and rich stone adds doses of class, amidst rich sofas, comfortable bedrooms and a chic dining area. Central London plus local dining is on your doorstep.

Guests can expect a stimulating environment, with luxury features and proximity to attractions with Marylebone Escape. The compact but efficient kitchen suits a small but active group of guests, while the coffee table area is ideal for relaxing over breakfast and planning an active day around this great capital city. This home has everything a visiting group could need, from the essentials like the in-house washing machine, to the nice extras, including the wine storage cellar.

Marylebone is the kind of neighborhood that will perfectly match those looking to get a lot of their time in London. With pleasant woodland parks nearby, including Regent’s Park, guests can take frequent public transport links, including the tube, to access the shopping cornucopia of Piccadilly Circus and magnificent landmarks like St Paul’s Cathedral and towering Big Ben. The rich history of the local area will be of great interest to literary and culinary-minded guests, with a huge number of restaurants, pubs and museums.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

For guests travelling in the warmer months, please note that air conditioning is not available at this property.

listing.listing_description:
Make history part of your holiday at Tria. This incredible villa combines the rich architectural heritage of the Ostuni area, partly a UNESCO-designated World Heritage Site for its distinctive stone dwellings known as trulli, with modern luxury. Spend a week or two steeped in local tradition and culture with up to six friends and family members, or reserve this three-bedroom property for an indulgent honeymoon in the Italian countryside.

This Puglia vacation rental is set on more than twelve acres featuring a heated swimming pool, plenty of sunbeds, a shaded fitness area, a fully equipped outdoor kitchen and al-fresco dining for eight. While the villa itself looks as though it could have been built centuries ago, amenities such as a private hammam, TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and air conditioning are decidedly modern.

Tria’s characteristic white walls and rounded stone roof surround intimate, beautifully appointed rooms. Wood beams and stone arches lend a feel of rustic coziness, while contemporary furnishings add a fresh touch in the living room, dining area and fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has one master suite with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with a double bed and two twin beds, respectively, that share access to a hall bathroom. Textures of stone and wood give the bedrooms the same invitingly rustic ambience as the main living areas.

Tria is set in the country outside the town of San Vito dei Normanni, where you can visit historic churches, see a medieval castle, stop for a coffee or do some shopping. Drive through the region, stopping to explore the hill towns and olive groves, or set a course for a day trip to the whitewashed city of Ostuni or the beaches of Lido Morelli and Torre Pozzelle.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Bedroom 2: 2 Single size beds, Access to hallway bathroom with stand-alone shower, Television

Fully equipped summer kitchen with built-in grill

listing.listing_description:
The pointed top of St. Mark’s Campanile rises above the rooftops in the views from this colorful apartment in the Incurabili neighborhood. While its influences are international—Moorish mirrors, Moroccan blue walls, and iconic British wallpaper—its soul is Venetian, from its original wrought-iron railing to its sun-splashed altana terrace. Walk 1 minute to the Gallerie dell’Accademia’s paintings.

 

Start holiday mornings with a cup from the villa’s Nespresso machine before you set out on foot or by vaporetto. After a day exploring the city, open a bottle of wine on the private terrace to sip as the sun goes down, or unwind with the help of the cable TV and Wi-Fi. The apartment is air conditioned to keep you comfortable on Italy’s warmest days and has laundry facilities.

 

Step through a doorway off Calle Navaro and follow the stairs up to this luxury property. Its first floor features a living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen with chic details such as eau-de-nil plaster walls, classic palm-print wallpaper, and whitewashed beamed ceilings. The second floor has a second living room as well as the terrace.

 

This vacation rental has one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that each have a king bed and shared access to a hall bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are air conditioned and have the richly hued plaster walls so characteristic of Venice.

 

The villa is a 1-minute walk from the Italian masterworks that fill the Gallerie dell’Accademia, and a 7-minute walk from the banks of the Canale Grande. You’ll also find plenty of restaurants and bars within walking distance, from the family friendly to the honeymoon-worthy. But it’s also a short trip on foot to several vaporetto, or water bus, stops, from which you can travel to St. Mark’s Square and the base of that campanile seen from your terrace.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Swim in the Aegean Sea at Katafygi Beach and return on foot to alfresco feasts at this stunning villa in Sounio along the Athens Riviera. Newly built, the architectural masterwork consists of 2 independent houses, each with a swimming pool, gourmet kitchen, living/dining area, and private entrance. Together they form the perfect seaside haven for a reunion with family or friends, just minutes from Cape Sounio and about 45 kilometers from central Athens.

The tiered pool terraces gaze out on sweeping views of the southern Attic coastline and the Saronic Gulf. A shared entertainment area is perched beneath a pergola on the upper terrace, with a barbecue, dining table, and bar. The edge of Katafygi Beach is just steps from the property.

Stylish yet welcoming interiors offer ample space for quiet afternoon downtime or festive evenings. Each villa includes a fully equipped kitchen, private dining room, and living area. Prepare a platter of meze to enjoy in the lounge before a home-cooked feast of local seafood and wine. Then pour glasses of ouzo from the wet bar to sip by the fire.

Villa Selenia Platinum is the larger house, with 5 deluxe queen bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, accommodating 10 guests. Villa Selenia Gold has 2 queen bedrooms, accommodating up to 4 guests. The spacious master and primary guest suites include elevated, in-room bathtubs with spa jets.

From its private perch in the Aeolos housing estate, Villa Selenia offers a wonderful experience of the Palaia Fokaia region, close to rustic villages, ancient archeological sites, and stunning beaches. Behold the famous sunsets from the Temple of Poseidon on Cape Sounio, about 8 kilometers away. Visit the charming, off-the-tourist radar Port of Lavrio, savoring the delicacies of its tavernas and catching a ferry to explore the Cyclades Islands. The myriad treasures of Athens are about 40 minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1 - Master: Queen size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & jetted bathtub, Direct access to patio

listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: Cancel up to 95 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 95 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular chalet is located in the heart of Chamonix-Mont Blanc, the jewel of the French Alps, just two kilometers from both Chamonix Village and the Brévent-Flégère ski slope. The chalet features sublime vistas of the Mont Blanc massif, beautiful outdoor and indoor living areas, and high-end amenities including an outdoor hot tub, a gourmet kitchen, and a stunning, mountain-view sauna. Services include daily housekeeping, complimentary shuttle service to the ski slopes, and chef-prepared meals. Five bedrooms provide comfortable accommodations for adults and kids, making Chalet Mont Blanc an ideal choice for families.

The chalet's open-concept great room is ideal for après-ski relaxation and festivities. Vaulted wood ceilings with exposed beams conjure a quintessential alpine ambiance, while ample windows infuse the space with abundant natural light and extraordinary views. Enjoy warm drinks in the lounge while watching your favorite shows on the Apple TV, and gather for hearty meals at the table for eight. Step onto the deck to breathe the mountain air, enjoying your meals alfresco in the warmer months.

Perhaps the chalet's most exceptional amenity is the barrel-shaped sauna on the ground floor, featuring ample seating, natural wood paneling, and an extraordinary circular window framing the mountains. Beside the sauna, the open-air hot tub invites you to soothing dips under the mountain sky, while a hammock welcomes afternoon siestas in the fragrant air.

The master bedroom includes a queen bed and opens directly to the lower terrace, giving you easy access to the spa area. Its ensuite bathroom features a dual vanity and rain shower. There are three guestrooms with pairs of twin beds; two enjoy ensuite bathrooms while the third shares a bathroom with the children's bunk room. The latter two rooms open to the spa terrace as well.

The location of Chalet Mont Blanc offers a prime balance of serene seclusion and convenient access to the splendors of Chamonix-Mont Blanc. Skiers are within easy reach of Brévent-Flégère, Grands Montets, Balme Vallorcine, and Les Houches, while mountaineers and hikers can travel twelve kilometers to the spectacular Aiguille Verte. The world-class dining, nightlife, and cultural riches of Chamonix Village are just a few minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
